000_prologue.title: Prologue
000_prologue.speaker: You
000_prologue.dialogue_line: This is where the story starts.

001_intro.title: Prologue
001_intro.speaker: You
001_intro.dialogue_line: I wonder what would have happened if i did not decide to do this. If i just had stayed home.

002_intro.title: Prologue
002_intro.speaker: You
002_intro.dialogue_line: But I guess... i'm not in a position to wonder anymore.
